content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: heavy_weighted_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 39, "index": 15}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 19, "index": 20}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a heavy_weighted_pressure_plate, I need to place 2 iron_ingot in a row in the crafting table. I will move the first iron_ingot from slot 26 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: heavy_weighted_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 39, "index": 15}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 19, "index": 20}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}]
thought: I have already placed one iron_ingot in slot 1, and therefore I will move the second iron_ingot from slot 26 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: heavy_weighted_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "heavy_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 39, "index": 15}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 19, "index": 20}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}]
thought: Now that the heavy_weighted_pressure_plate has been crafted, I can move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
